transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello? Sir, hi, main Pallavi bol rahi hu, Abhishek Rai ki senior manager IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Sir aapka na IndiaMART pe incoming aaya tha, matlab aapne call kara tha Abhishek ji ko, bataiye sir kya problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: [inaudible] kar raha hu usme problem aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir, toh abhi aapka concern hum close kar de kya?
Customer: Haan, theek hai, close karwa do.
Executive: Sir, main close kar de rahi hu, aap owner baat kar rahe hai na, Aminur sir baat kar rahe hai na?
Customer: Haan, haan, owner baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai, sir, main na aapko primary mail pe ek feedback dungi, satisfied ka, please usko aap matlab yes mein reply kar dijiyega, satisfied mein.
Executive: Sir, please karwa dijiyega, main close kar de rahi hu abhi, theek hai? Jab aap free hai na, Abhishek ji ke number hoga, aap unse call kar lijiyega sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issue with [inaudible].

- Wants to close the concern.



Resolution:

- Executive closed the concern.

- Asked to reply 'yes' to the feedback mail.



Next Steps: 

- Customer can call Abhishek when free.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- concern, feedback, close
